translations.en:
: ** :european_castle: You see a castle in the distance. You decide to approach the main entrance, it seems to be that of Duke Benatis. Known for his banana farms, he organizes a party for his 21st birthday. When you approach a little closer, a guard invites you to enter as the Duke wants everyone to participate in the party. When you return, you see a huge feast awaiting the attendees.

:prince: Go to the Duke
:tada: Stay at the party
:gift: Give him a present
:banana: Go and steal bananas from his farm

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
